article_node.title: Fundamental Administrative Services, LLC Provides Notice of Data Security Event
article_node.summary: Fundamental Administrative Services LLC announced a data security event that exposed personal information of residents in long‑term care facilities, with an unauthorized actor copying files between October 27, 2024, and January 13, 2025. The compromised data could include names, SSNs, driver’s license numbers, financial account details, medical and insurance information, and dates of birth. Affected individuals are being notified by letter and can obtain further details via a toll‑free line or the company’s website, which also offers guidance on protecting against identity theft. The company has tightened security measures and is reviewing policies to prevent future incidents.
